org.akubraproject.rmi.remote
Interface RemoteXAResource

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerXAResource
public interface RemoteXAResource
extends Remote

Represents an XA Resource on tha akubra server side.

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan
